attributes.additional_details: For to long M.P's have had the privilege of having a recess more often than those in businesses throughout the land and we the undersigned are demanding that Parliament is changed. We demand that M.P's work from Monday to Friday 9-5 longer if their is a crutial debate or vote and that members holidays are on a length of service basis with the maximum for new members of 3 months. Plus all members must attend failure will mean sanctions
